1.title: Under the Knife
1.plot: Football Superstar Terrell Owens' faith is put to the test as he finds himself faced with emergency ACL surgery and a professional future in turmoil.

2.title: Road to Recovery
2.plot: Recovering from surgery, Terrell's doctor says the road to recovery will be a challenging one if he wants to play football the upcoming season.

3.title: Move to Miami
3.plot: Terrell, now up & walking, agrees with Kita to move to Miami where they can both focus on professional & personal goals. Monique's awkward arrival to Miami threatens the very foundation of their "One Team, One Dream" friendship.

4.title: Bad Influences, Good Ideas
4.plot: Basketball icon & friend John Salley offers Terrell sage advice on maneuvering the waters following a sports retirement & encourages him to focus on what he loves. Salley also drags Terrell, Monique & Kita through Miami nightlife

5.title: T.O. Cutz & Curlz
5.plot: Anxious to bring more visibility and financial gain to his barbershop, 'T.O. Cutz", Terrell brainstorms a shortlist of ideas with his staff. However Monique and Kita recognize a much bigger opportunity for the business.

6.title: Back to Bama
6.plot: Terrell accepts an invitation to be a groomsmen at his cousin Tony's wedding in Alabama. There, he takes the opportunity to tell his family about his recent surgery and impending financial changes that could impact everyone.

7.title: Star 81
7.plot: Behind the scenes of his first full-length film, Terrell quickly realizes that he may not be ready for his close-up. However, screen sirens Stacey Dash and Stacey Keebler bring fire and romance to his scenes.

8.title: The Next Stage
8.plot: Terrell jumps at the chance to walk the boards of a huge hit musical, but first he has to audition for the role along side Angie Stone & Tyson Beckford. Kita & Monique tweak final details of the barber shop launch party.

9.title: Fantastic Voyage
9.plot: Feeling confident with his recent life choices and of optimal health, Terrell chooses to thank Kita, Monique and Adrienne for their support with a surprise trip to the Bahamas, also inviting both Victor and Joe to come along.

10.title: Next Steps
10.plot: Terrell hits the red carpet for his "Dysfunctional Friends" movie premiere. Back in LA, Mo and Kita must face the press alone when the news breaks about Terrell's injury and he is nowhere to be found.

1.title: Introducing T.O.

3.title: T.O.'s Emotional Trip Home
3.plot: Inspired by Mo, Owens says that "now's the time for him to have a sit-down with his estranged father". He, Pablo, and Mo travel to Alexander City, Alabama, which is Owens's hometown, to visit his old high school and his family.

4.title: Momma Mo
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: It's Party Time
5.plot: Terrell is torn between two girls so Mo and Kita force him to make a choice.

6.title: What Happens in Vegas...
6.plot: As the date of Mo?s vow renewal ceremony approaches, Kita plans to throw her a bachelorette party in Vegas. Not to be outdone, Terrell and the guys throw Vic, Mo?s husband, a bachelor party.

7.title: The Ceremony
7.plot: It's the weekend of Mo's wedding and tensions arise.

1.title: Bye Bye Buffalo
1.plot: Terrell's back in Los Angeles after a disappointing season in Buffalo, which has him questioning his future in football.

2.title: Family Ties
2.plot: As Terrell settles into his new Los Angeles digs, his faltering relationship with Kari drives him into therapy.

3.title: Empire State of T.O.
3.plot: Terrell and Kita head to New York where Terrell tries his hand at modeling during New York Fashion Week.

4.title: Man's Best Friends
4.plot: With Mo just weeks away from giving birth, Terrell fills in for her husband Vic at birthing class.

5.title: Sex and Secrets
5.plot: When Terrell guest stars on a television talk show about sex, his girlfriend Kari hears more than she can handle.

6.title: Old Habits
6.plot: Tensions rise when Terrell is invited to a special Pros vs. Joes basketball competition and is reunited with his old Philadelphia Eagles teammate, Donovan McNabb.

7.title: Love Game
7.plot: Terrell gives Kita a lesson in tennis etiquette when they travel to Miami to see Andy Roddick play in a tournament.

8.title: Kentucky Kita
8.plot: Terrell accompanies Kita back to her hometown of Louisville, where he meets her family, and attends the Kentucky Derby.

9.title: Taking Chances
9.plot: Terrell moves closer to his dream of becoming an actor when he lands an audition for his first leading role in a film.

10.title: Hail Mary

imdb.plot outline: By any standard, wide receiver Terrell Owens is a superstar. His explosive speed, superb physical conditioning, and dynamic competitive spirit should seemingly translate to off-the-field success in love, family and life. But even at the top of his game, something is missing, and this off-season Terrell Owens finds himself a man in transition. Brash and outspoken, a media magnet, the private Terrell is a low-key introspective native of tiny Alexander City, Alabama who never forgets where he came from. To help reconcile the contradictions in his persona -- he's both "T.O.," a controversial hero to thousands of fans, and "Terrell Owens," a single guy still searching for the right woman - he's taking some time in Los Angeles to chill out, reflect and be closer to his friends. But because his "T.O." side is always present just beneath the surface, things won't stay quiet for long. Terrell is not on this journey alone. His best friends and publicists, Monique Jackson and Kita Williams, are there every step of the way. They are determined to shepherd their friend and client into success off the field, voicing their very distinct opinions about who Terrell should date, and who he shouldn't, while simultaneously running the "T.O. brand." They also aren't above a little subterfuge to get their way, keeping a close eye on Terrell at red carpet events, gatherings at his house, club openings and even on cruise ships -- never hesitating to pull back the reins and remind him that this off-season is about getting in touch with his inner Terrell. From the dramatic end of his tenure in Dallas to his exciting new chapter in Buffalo, Monique and Kita also encourage Terrell to travel home to Alexander City, Alabama to share a poignant visit with his estranged father. Could this meeting help explain why he is who he is today? And, will it inspire Terrell to rethink his own role as a father? Emotional, entertaining and most of all revealing, Terrell Owens will expose his personal life as never before, bringing all the drama, energy and heart that only he can bring.
imdb.title: The T.O. Show
plot: By any standard, wide receiver Terrell Owens is a superstar. His explosive speed, superb physical conditioning, and dynamic competitive spirit should seemingly translate to off-the-field success in love, family and life. But even at the top of his game, something is missing, and this off-season Terrell Owens finds himself a man in transition. Brash and outspoken, a media magnet, the private Terrell is a low-key introspective native of tiny Alexander City, Alabama who never forgets where he came from. To help reconcile the contradictions in his persona -- he's both "T.O.," a controversial hero to thousands of fans, and "Terrell Owens," a single guy still searching for the right woman - he's taking some time in Los Angeles to chill out, reflect and be closer to his friends. But because his "T.O." side is always present just beneath the surface, things won't stay quiet for long. Terrell is not on this journey alone. His best friends and publicists, Monique Jackson and Kita Williams, are there every step of the way. They are determined to shepherd their friend and client into success off the field, voicing their very distinct opinions about who Terrell should date, and who he shouldn't, while simultaneously running the "T.O. brand." They also aren't above a little subterfuge to get their way, keeping a close eye on Terrell at red carpet events, gatherings at his house, club openings and even on cruise ships -- never hesitating to pull back the reins and remind him that this off-season is about getting in touch with his inner Terrell. From the dramatic end of his tenure in Dallas to his exciting new chapter in Buffalo, Monique and Kita also encourage Terrell to travel home to Alexander City, Alabama to share a poignant visit with his estranged father. Could this meeting help explain why he is who he is today? And, will it inspire Terrell to rethink his own role as a father? Emotional, entertaining and most of all revealing, Terrell Owens will expose his personal life as never before, bringing all the drama, energy and heart that only he can bring.::Den of Thieves
